#summary Features that will be included in nesC netbeans plugin

= Introduction =

The plugin provides integrated development environment for nesC-based project. 


= Features =

The features that are included in the plugin:
  * Create new nesC project
  * Open nesC project
  * Create new configuration file / new interface file / new module file
  * Syntax highlighting
  * Code completion
  * Automatic makefile generation for new file / directory
